title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: The Help view does not start in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
EB: We should be starting the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the Help view.
3. Observe that the Help view does not respond to keyboard navigation immediately.
4. Click on any 'live' area such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
5. Observe that after clicking on a 'live' area, the Help view starts responding to keyboard navigation.
